name: Butterfree
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

attacks.name: Magic Dust
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now either Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned (your choice).

attacks.name: Hyper Reverse
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon. After doing damage, remove a number of damage counters from Butterfree equal to the amount of damage done to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
